ing.item: (6-oz) frozen orange juice concentrate; thawed and undiluted
(6-oz) frozen lemonade concentrate; thawed and undiluted

directions.step:
Here are some recipes for holiday season drinks, copied from Southern Living Magazine a few years ago:
Pour boiling water over tea bags; cover and let stand 5 minutes. Remove tea bags and discard. Transfer tea to a 2-quart freezer container. Stir in 3 1/2 C. water and next 4 ingredients. Cover and freeze until firm. To serve, partially thaw until slushy. Pour equal amounts of slush mixture and ginger ale into serving glasses. Yield: 1 gallon.
